channel.title: [614/637] How do i make myself Admin/Staff on this? [Dementhium source]
channel.description: ok well the title says it all.. how do i make myself admin? because im new to 614+ :P

item.title: [614/637] How do i make myself Admin/Staff on this? [Dementhium source]
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Leoiscool:

ok well the title says it all… how do i make myself admin? because im new to 614+

Why are you using Demeth? I downloaded it and had a mess around and kinda figured out how some things work and the only other server that I’ve touched thats not a 317 is Gazzascape and that was for 10mins >.>.
Back to 317 with you!

item.title: [614/637] How do i make myself Admin/Staff on this? [Dementhium source]
item.dc:creator: @Aaronlegit Aaronlegit
item.description:
@Aaronlegit wrote:

go into mtp/src/org/dementhium/net/atctionhandler search for marcbot or a name and change it to your name

item.source: [614/637] How do i make myself Admin/Staff on this? [Dementhium source]

item.title: [614/637] How do i make myself Admin/Staff on this? [Dementhium source]
item.dc:creator: @Leoiscool Leoiscool
item.description:
@Leoiscool wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:9, topic:417847”][quote author=Leoiscool link=topic=520396.msg3779349#msg3779349 date=1318335925]

isnt there a editor or something?

Hex editor. Otherwise you need to make a command to set your player rights to ADMIN, then save your account.

how do i make a command for right then? or how do i use hex editor?
[/quote]

Command would be easier.

Probably something like this:

if (args[0].equals("set")) {
    if (args[1].equals("rights")) {
        final int rights = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
        client.rights = rights;
        // force save
    }
}

Note that that code wont work, as I pulled it out of my ass, but the process will.[/quote]

well the commands in this source look like this:

	if (command[0].equals("commands") || command[0].equals("help")) {
		BookManager.proceedBook(player, 4);
	}

that command opens the book with commands in it

Read full topic
item.source: [614/637] How do i make myself Admin/Staff on this? [Dementhium source]

item.title: [614/637] How do i make myself Admin/Staff on this? [Dementhium source]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Leoiscool, post:8, topic:417847”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=520396.msg3779346#msg3779346 date=1318335468]

isnt there a editor or something?

Hex editor. Otherwise you need to make a command to set your player rights to ADMIN, then save your account.
[/quote]

how do i make a command for right then? or how do i use hex editor?[/quote]

Command would be easier.

Probably something like this:

if (args[0].equals("set")) {
    if (args[1].equals("rights")) {
        final int rights = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
        client.rights = rights;
        // force save
    }
}

Note that that code wont work, as I pulled it out of my ass, but the process will.

Read full topic
